descriptionlist.description: SOME FEATURES: Swipe right on a conversation to hide / show Swipe right on a conversation to lock / unblock Swipe left on a conversation to pin / unpin Reorder conversations Mark conversations Change 3D / Haptic conversation markers to conversation to mark her Protect hidden conversations with Face Face, Touch ID or a password Switch between different lists using the Iris button or activation actions Automatically hide messages from unknown senders Automatically sync all lists in iCloud Switch quickly between conversations ... and much, much more!.
